item.title: Model building of golf putting with Turing.jl
item.description: First Thing (Disclaimer) This blog post is based on a blog post written by the popular bayesian statistician Andrew Gelman. Dr. Gelman’s post was written in the Stan probabilistic programming language (or PPL). Since this post, there have been a couple other blog posts translating the code to other PPLs. They are excellent and I definitely recommend checking them out. Here’s the list of links and my opinion on some of the benefits of reading each:
